salary.title: Salary Take-Home Calculator
salary.description: Enter your salary to calculate the actual amount you can receive after deducting 4 major insurances, income tax, and local income tax.

input.nonTaxableDesc: Meal allowance, transportation, childcare leave benefit, etc.

yearEndTax.title: Year-end Tax Settlement Preparation
yearEndTax.content: Collect medical expenses, education expenses, and donation receipts in advance to receive more tax credits in year-end tax settlement.

taxSaving.title: Tax Saving Methods
taxSaving.content: You can increase your take-home pay by utilizing tax credit benefits such as IRP and pension savings.

table.title: Take-Home Salary Table by Annual Income
table.description: From 20 million to 200 million KRW in 1 million KRW increments

points.0: Calculated in 1 million KRW increments from 20 million to 200 million KRW
points.1: The higher the take-home ratio, the lower the tax burden
points.2: For high income earners, the take-home ratio decreases due to progressive tax rates
points.3: Actual take-home pay may increase further with additional deductions during year-end tax settlement

guide.title: Salary Calculation Master Guide
guide.subtitle: From new employees to executives! A complete guide to mastering everything about salary calculation. We'll tell you all the secrets to increase your take-home pay, from 4 major insurances to year-end tax settlement!

accurate.title: Latest 2025 Tax Law
accurate.description: Accurate calculation based on National Tax Service official data, reflecting 4 major insurance premiums, income tax rates, and various deductions in real-time!

0.title: Accurate 4 major insurance premiums
0.content: Health insurance 3.545%, National pension 4.5%, Employment insurance 0.9% accurately reflected

1.title: 6-tier progressive tax rate
1.content: Accurate tax rate application by income bracket from 6% to 45%

2.title: Various tax credits
2.content: Perfect calculation including work income tax credit and child tax credit

smart.title: Smart Analysis System
smart.description: Smart salary analysis beyond simple calculation! See everything from effective tax rate to tax-saving points at a glance.
points: Effective tax rate analysis: Check the actual tax payment ratio at a glance
Tax-saving guide: Customized proposals for utilizing non-taxable income and income deductions
Salary comparison table: Take-home pay by bracket from 20 million to 200 million KRW at a glance

practical.title: Practical Optimization Tools
practical.description: From HR teams to individuals! Maximize work efficiency with convenient features that can be used directly in practice.
points: Calculation history management: Save and compare multiple scenarios for analysis
URL sharing: Easily share calculation results via URL
Responsive design: Perfect anywhere - PC, tablet, mobile

points.0: Work income deduction: Progressive deduction applied according to total salary
points.1: 4 major insurances: Health insurance 3.545%, National pension 4.5% (cap 80.52 million KRW), Employment insurance 0.9%
points.2: Long-term care insurance: 12.27% of health insurance premium
points.4: Work income tax credit and child tax credit reflected
points.5: Refund possible with additional deductions during year-end tax settlement

realEstate.title: Real Estate Calculator
realEstate.description: Calculate real estate investment returns and acquisition tax.
